privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: This privacy policy describes how Elepad collects, uses and protects your personal information.

dataCollection.title: What data we collect
dataCollection.personalInfoDetails:
• First and last name
• Email address
• Profile picture (optional)
• Date of birth
• Authentication information (when using Google OAuth)
dataCollection.usageDataDetails:
• Progress and scores in cognitive games (Memory, Sudoku, NET, Focus)
• Achievements and activity streaks
• History of completed games
• Application usage frequency
dataCollection.userContentDetails:
• Shared memories and stories
• Family photos and albums
• Calendar events and activities
• Personal notes and descriptions
dataCollection.familyDataDetails:
• Information about family group members (with their consent)
• Family relationships
• Content shared within the group

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.locationDetails: Your data is securely stored on Supabase servers, which uses AWS infrastructure with SOC 2 certification.
dataStorage.encryptionDetails: All information is transmitted via HTTPS/TLS and stored with encryption at rest.
dataStorage.retentionDetails: We maintain your data while your account is active. If you don't use the application for 2 consecutive years, we will contact you to confirm if you wish to keep your account.
dataStorage.backupDetails: We perform automatic backups that are kept for 30 days for disaster recovery.

permissions.title: Application Permissions
permissions.cameraDetails: To take profile photos and add images to your memories. We only access photos that you select.
permissions.calendarDetails: To sync family events with Google Calendar. You can link or unlink at any time.
permissions.notificationsDetails: For reminders of events, achievements and streak celebrations. You can disable them at any time.

privacy.changesDetails: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through an in-app notice or email. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically.

contact.title: Questions or Concerns?
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please don't hesitate to contact us:

warning.title: This action is permanent and irreversible
warning.description: Once your request is processed, we will not be able to recover your account or data. Please read the information carefully before proceeding.

whatGetsDeleted.title: Data that will be permanently deleted
whatGetsDeleted.description: When deleting your Elepad account, the following data will be permanently deleted:
whatGetsDeleted.accountInfoDetails: Name, email, date of birth, profile picture and authentication credentials.
whatGetsDeleted.gameProgressDetails: All your scores, achievements, streaks and game statistics (Memory, Sudoku, NET, Focus).
whatGetsDeleted.memoriesDetails: All photos, albums, notes and memories you have created.
whatGetsDeleted.eventsDetails: All family events, scheduled activities and Google Calendar synchronizations.
whatGetsDeleted.familyGroupsDetails: You will be removed from all family groups. Content shared by other members will remain visible to them.
whatGetsDeleted.activityHistoryDetails: All your application usage history and behavior metrics.

whatRemains.title: Data that is retained (Temporarily)
whatRemains.description: For legal, technical and security reasons, some data is retained for a limited period:
whatRemains.systemLogsDetails: Technical logs necessary for security, fraud detection and error debugging. They do not contain personally identifiable information.
whatRemains.backupsDetails: Automatic backups are completely purged after 30 days of account deletion.
whatRemains.sharedContentDetails: The memories and photos you shared with your family group will remain visible to other members, but your identification as author will be removed.
whatRemains.note: Note: After the indicated retention periods, all remaining data is permanently and irrecoverably deleted from our systems.

deletionProcess.title: Account Deletion Process
deletionProcess.description: Follow these steps to request the deletion of your Elepad account:

step1.title: Step 1: Make a copy of your data (Optional)
step1.description:
Before deleting your account, you can export your data from the app:
Profile → Settings → Privacy → Download my data
You will receive a file with all your memories, photos and statistics.

step2.title: Step 2: Send your request
step2.description: Send an email from the account registered in Elepad to:
step2.subject: Account Deletion Request - Elepad

items.name: • Your full name registered in the app
items.confirmation: • Confirmation that you understand this action is irreversible
items.reason: • Reason for deletion (optional, helps us improve)

step3.title: Step 3: Identity verification
step3.description: For security, we will verify your identity. You will receive a confirmation code by email that you must respond to. This ensures you are the legitimate account holder.

step4.title: Step 4: Reflection period (7 days)
step4.description: After confirming your identity, your account will enter a 'pending deletion' period of 7 calendar days. During this time:

items.cancel: ✓ You can cancel the request if you change your mind
items.deactivated: ✓ Your account will be deactivated but your data intact
items.noAccess: ✓ You will not be able to access the application

step5.title: Step 5: Permanent deletion
step5.description: After 7 days, if you do not cancel the request, your account and all associated data will be deleted permanently and irreversibly. You will receive a final confirmation email when the process is completed.
